beg beginning single_crochet single_crochet chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch chain-space chain-space space/sps space/spaces double_crochet double_crochet st/sts stitch/stitches the reusable produce bag was created to provide an alternative to the single-use plastic bags common in supermarkets the pattern is written for three different sizes s/m/l presented in this order based on the measurements of some commonly found reusable produce bags offered for sale feel free to customize the sizes to suit your personal needs by making them wider or shorter to adjust the size add or remove a multiple of 4 stitches from the number for the starting chain the mesh stitch used is very stretchy and the bags will grow a lot when full the bag is worked in the round from the base up when joining the end of each round in the 3rd chain of the beginning chain make sure you catch two loops from the chain stitch otherwise the joining line will be weak placing stitch markers in the ch2-space corners facilitates finding the increase lines consider using different colors for the cords and/or the stoppers for each size as an easy way to distinguish them charts are given after the written
